text: Donald MacKay Fraser (February 20, 1924 - June 2, 2019) was an American politician. He was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota. He served in the United States House of Representatives from Minnesota's 5th congressional district from 1963 to 1979. He served as the 44th Mayor of Minneapolis from 1980 to 1993.Donald M. Fraser Papers Fraser died on June 2, 2019 in Minneapolis at the age of 95.A Minnesota politician for four decades, Don Fraser has died at 95 ==References== ==Other websites== *Fraser, Donald MacKay, (1924â€“ ).
